posts.author: Neptulon
posts.content: Not sure if I removed it by accident, or if something happened. But, do you guys know how to make an druid? For arelith, with a level cap of 30? I just saw shifters can't be taken, so I'm at a lose a little ^^

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Hey man!

Please make sure that you provide all the info. I believe I saw somewhere that Druid / Monks are illegal on Arelith. Could you check that for me please?

posts.author: Neptulon
posts.content:
Maximillian Kane wrote:
Hey man!

Please make sure that you provide all the info. I believe I saw somewhere that Druid / Monks are illegal on Arelith. Could you check that for me please?
Hey Max thanks for the speedy reply!

Well from what I've seen, they aren't illegal persay. Just...I'd have to roleplay it darn near perfectly or risk CD (Character Deletion), and the like.

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content: OK, let me try to cook up something, although a Druid / CoT / Monk might not reach enough Wisdom for Dragon Shape without some gimping. Let me get back to you.

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Here's what I cooked up. I would have liked to throw in a bit of Spell Focus, but it wasn't possible. Not enough feats, especially in epics, not even for Armor Skin (not that you need it with a Dragon lol)

Druid(20), Champion of Torm(6), Monk(4), Human

STR: 14
DEX: 8
CON: 10
WIS: 18 (30)
INT: 14
CHA: 8

Human: (Quick to Master)
01: Druid(1): Blind Fight, Extend Spell
02: Druid(2)
03: Druid(3): Weapon Focus: Scimitar
04: Druid(4): WIS+1, (WIS=19)
05: Druid(5)
06: Druid(6): Zen Archery
07: Druid(7)
08: Druid(8): WIS+1, (WIS=20)
09: Druid(9): Empower Spell
10: Druid(10)
11: Druid(11)
12: Druid(12): WIS+1, Knockdown, (WIS=21)
13: Druid(13)
14: Druid(14)
15: Druid(15): Improved Knockdown
16: Druid(16): WIS+1, (WIS=22)
17: Druid(17)
18: Druid(18): Improved Critical: Unarmed
19: Druid(19)
20: Champion of Torm(1): WIS+1, (WIS=23)
21: Champion of Torm(2): Great Wisdom I, Great Wisdom II, (WIS=25)
22: Champion of Torm(3): {Smite Evil}
23: Champion of Torm(4): Great Wisdom III, (WIS=26)
24: Monk(1): WIS+1, Great Wisdom IV, {Cleave, Evasion, Improved Unarmed Strike, Stunning Fist}, (WIS=28)
25: Monk(2): {Deflect Arrows}
26: Monk(3)
27: Monk(4): Epic Prowess
28: Champion of Torm(5): WIS+1, (WIS=29)
29: Champion of Torm(6): Great Wisdom V, (WIS=30)
30: Druid(20): Dragon Shape

Hitpoints: 252
Skillpoints: 219
Saving Throws (Fortitude/Will/Reflex): 21/29/15
Saving Throw bonuses:
Spells: +6, Mind Effects: +2, Fear: +2
BAB: 20
AB (max, naked): 24 (melee), 31 (ranged)
AC (naked/mundane armor/shield only): 25/25
Spell Casting: Druid(9)
Alignment Changes: 0

Animal Empathy 32(31), Concentration 33(33), Discipline 32(34), Heal 32(42), Spellcraft 28(30), Spot 32(42), Tumble 30(29)

01: Animal Empathy(4), Concentration(4), Heal(4), Spellcraft(4), Save(12),
02: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(15),
03: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(18),
04: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(21),
05: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(24),
06: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(27),
07: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(30),
08: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(33),
09: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(36),
10: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(39),
11: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(42),
12: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(45),
13: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(48),
14: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(51),
15: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(54),
16: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(57),
17: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(60),
18: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(63),
19: Animal Empathy(1), Concentration(1), Heal(1), Spellcraft(1), Save(66),
20: Discipline(23), Heal(1), Spot(23), Save(24),
1: Discipline(1), Heal(1), Spot(1), Save(26),
22: Discipline(1), Heal(1), Spot(1), Save(28),
23: Discipline(1), Heal(1), Spot(1), Save(30),
24: Concentration(5), Discipline(1), Heal(1), Tumble(27), Save(3),
25: Concentration(1), Discipline(1), Heal(1), Tumble(1), Save(6),
26: Concentration(1), Discipline(1), Heal(1), Tumble(1), Save(9),
27: Concentration(1), Discipline(1), Heal(1), Tumble(1), Save(12),
28: Discipline(1), Heal(1), Spot(5), Save(10),
29: Discipline(1), Heal(1), Spot(1), Save(12),
30: Animal Empathy(10), Concentration(3), Spellcraft(6),

The stat increases may open the possibility for you to change this build up a little. you can go Druid 16 CoT 4 pre-epic for a higher AB and take Knockdown and Improved Knockdown with the two bonus feats, still ending up at 30 Wisdom by level 30. Then you can take Spell Focus and Greater Spell Focus in Transmutation to increase the DC of your Storm of Vengeance. Just maintain the Monk levels and the last two CoT levels in the same places and you should do fine. That will give you an extra attack per round, but I couldn't do it on the CBC because it wouldn't let me start with 20 Wisdom.

Take it EZ!
